변수선택

dt <- data.frame(

 x1 = c(7,1,11,11,7,11,3,1,2,21,1,11,10),
 x2 = c(26,29,56,31,52,55,71,31,54,47,40,66,68),
 x3 = c(6,15,8,8,6,9,17,22,18,4,23,9,8),
 x4 = c(60,52,20,47,33,22,6,44,22,26,34,12,12),
 y = c(78.5,74.3,104.3,87.6,95.9,109.2,102.7,72.5,93.1,115.9,83.8,113.3,109.4)
)
pairs(dt, pch=16)
cor(dt)
A matrix: 5 × 5 of type dbl
x1x2x3x4y
x1 1.0000000 0.2285795-0.8241338-0.2454451 0.7307175
x2 0.2285795 1.0000000-0.1392424-0.9729550 0.8162526
x3-0.8241338-0.1392424 1.0000000 0.0295370-0.5346707
x4-0.2454451-0.9729550 0.0295370 1.0000000-0.8213050
y 0.7307175 0.8162526-0.5346707-0.8213050 1.0000000

  • Full Model : \(𝑦 = 𝛽_0 + 𝛽_1𝑥_1 + 𝛽_2𝑥_2 + 𝛽_3𝑥_3 + 𝛽_4𝑥_4 + \epsilon\)
m <- lm(y~., dt) ##FM
summary(m)

전진선택법

  • Start model : \(𝑦 = 𝛽_0 + \epsilon\)
m0 = lm(y ~ 1, data = dt)
add1(m0,
 scope = y ~ x1 + x2 + x3+ x4,
 test = "F") ## x4추가

AIC를 이용한 변수 선택법

Backward - AIC

model_back = step(m, direction = "backward")
summary(model_back)
Start:  AIC=26.94
y ~ x1 + x2 + x3 + x4

       Df Sum of Sq    RSS    AIC
- x3    1    0.1091 47.973 24.974
- x4    1    0.2470 48.111 25.011
- x2    1    2.9725 50.836 25.728
<none>              47.864 26.944
- x1    1   25.9509 73.815 30.576

Step:  AIC=24.97
y ~ x1 + x2 + x4

       Df Sum of Sq    RSS    AIC
<none>               47.97 24.974

- x2    1     26.79  74.76 28.742
- x1    1    820.91 868.88 60.629

Forward - AIC

model_forward = step(
 m0,
 scope = y ~ x1 + x2 + x3+ x4,
 direction = "forward")
summary(model_forward)
Start:  AIC=71.44
y ~ 1

       Df Sum of Sq     RSS    AIC
+ x4    1   1831.90  883.87 58.852
+ x2    1   1809.43  906.34 59.178

+ x3    1    776.36 1939.40 69.067

Step - AIC

model_step = step(
 m0,
 scope = y ~ x1 + x2 + x3+ x4,
 direction = "both")
summary(model_step)
Start:  AIC=71.44
y ~ 1
